data.title: Kairana PIN Code & Post Office in Kairana, Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh
data.meta_description: Kairana is a Speed Post Sub Post Office aka Dak Ghar in Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh which deliver the mails and take bookings. Postal Department of India alloted 247774 PIN Code to this office. In terms of location, Kairana PO is situtated in the Kairana taluk,  Kairana postal sub-district,  Bareilly postal region,  Muzaffarnagar postal division under the  Uttar Pradesh postal circle.
data.text:
Post Office Name Kairana Sub Post Office Kairana PIN Code Number 247774 Related Head-Office Muzaffarnagar Post Office Delivery Available? YES Circle Name Uttar Pradesh Circle Telephone Number 01398-266703 District Name Muzaffarnagar District Taluk Name Kairana Town Sub-District Name Kairana Sub-district Region Name Bareilly Region Division Name Muzaffarnagar Division Address The Postmaster, Kairana Sub Post Office, Kairana, Muzaffarnagar, Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh [UP], India, PIN Code: 247774 Opening/Closing Timings In general, post offices in India operate with varying working hours. Most post offices, including Kairana, open in the morning between 8:00 am to 10:00 am and closes between 4:00 pm to 6:00 pm. The working days are Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday. Kairana Post Office remains closed on Sundays and national holidays, unless notified. The official opening and closing timings, as well as working days of Kairana Sub Post Office, are not known to us. Customer Care Phone No. 18002666868 (9am to 6pm)

1800112011 (For International Mails)

18004252440 (For Banking/ATM Card) Online Complaint http://ccc.cept.gov.in/complaintregistration.aspx Emails webinformationmanager@indiapost.gov.in (General Manager)

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs):

What is the PIN Code of Kairana?

Answer: The PIN Code of Kairana located in Muzaffarnagar is 247774.

Where is Kairana Post Office located at?

Answer: The complete address of Kairana Speed Post office is: The Postmaster, Kairana Post Office (Sub Post Office), Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh (UP), India

How many villages are situated near Kairana?

Answer: There are around 60 villages in Uttar Pradesh which have the same PIN code as Kairana i.e. 247774. Few of them are: Ghissugarh, Barnabi, Kairana, Mandawar, Jangheri, Akaberpur Sunehti, Erti and Sahpat Ahat Sabiq.

What other post offices are available near Kairana?

Answer: In case you couldn't visit Kairana for some reason, other nearby post offices are: Bhoora, Titarwara, Uncha Gaon, Khurgaon Issopur, Kheri Buchha, Kandela and Beenra.
